@description.name: @description
@description.body: Disconnects and disposes given objects from instance. Only works with qx.core.Object based objects e.g. Widgets.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: obj {Object} Object which contains the fields

@param.name: @param
@param.body: arr {Array} List of fields (which store objects) to dispose
@param.description: List of fields (which store objects) to dispose

@param.name: @param
@param.body: disposeSingletons {Boolean?} true, if singletons should be disposed
@param.description: true, if singletons should be disposed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Disposes all members of the given array and deletes the field which refers to the array afterwards.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: obj {Object} Object which contains the field

@param.name: @param
@param.body: field {String} Name of the field which refers to the array
@param.description: Name of the field which refers to the array

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Disposes all members of the given map and deletes the field which refers to the map afterwards.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: obj {Object} Object which contains the field

@param.name: @param
@param.body: field {String} Name of the field which refers to the array
@param.description: Name of the field which refers to the array

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Disposes a given object when another object is disposed

@param.name: @param
@param.body: disposeMe {Object} Object to dispose when other object is disposed
@param.description: Object to dispose when other object is disposed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Destroys a container and all of its children recursively.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
container {qx.ui.container.Composite | qx.ui.container.Scroll |
   qx.ui.container.SlideBar | qx.ui.container.Stack} Container to be destroyed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper function to collect all children widgets of an container recursively.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: container {qx.ui.container.Composite | qx.ui.container.Scroll | qx.ui.container.SlideBar | qx.ui.container.Stack} Container to be destroyed

@param.name: @param
@param.body: arr {Array} Array which holds all children widgets
@param.description: Array which holds all children widgets

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks if the given object is a qx container widget

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the object is a container for child widgets
@return.description: true if the object is a container for child widgets
